5 use Ajax\semantic\html\collections\form\HtmlFormField;

9 use Ajax\semantic\widgets\dataform\DataForm;

26 class FormModelViewerTrait {
27 
28  protected function relationMembersInForm($form, $instance, $className, $fields, $relations) {
29  foreach ( $relations as $field => $member ) {
30  if (array_search ( $field, $fields ) !== false) {
31  if (OrmUtils::getAnnotationInfoMember ( $className, "#manyToOne", $member ) !== false) {
32  $this->manyToOneFormField ( $form, $member, $className, $instance );
33  } elseif (($annot = OrmUtils::getAnnotationInfoMember ( $className, "#oneToMany", $member )) !== false) {
34  $this->oneToManyFormField ( $form, $member, $instance, $annot );
35  } elseif (($annot = OrmUtils::getAnnotationInfoMember ( $className, "#manyToMany", $member )) !== false) {
36  $this->manyToManyFormField ( $form, $member, $instance, $annot );
37  }
38  }
39  }
40  }
41 
42  protected function manyToOneFormField(DataForm $form, $member, $className, $instance) {
43  $joinColumn = OrmUtils::getAnnotationInfoMember ( $className, "#joinColumn", $member );
44  if ($joinColumn) {
45  $fkObject = Reflexion::getMemberValue ( $instance, $member );
46  $fkClass = $joinColumn ["className"];
47  if ($fkObject === null) {
48  $fkObject = new $fkClass ();
49  }
50  $fkId = OrmUtils::getFirstKey ( $fkClass );
51  $fkIdGetter = "get" . \ucfirst ( $fkId );
52  if (\method_exists ( $fkObject, "__toString" ) && \method_exists ( $fkObject, $fkIdGetter )) {
53  $fkField = $joinColumn ["name"];
54  $fkValue = OrmUtils::getFirstKeyValue ( $fkObject );
55  if (! Reflexion::setMemberValue ( $instance, $fkField, $fkValue )) {
56  $instance->{$fkField} = OrmUtils::getFirstKeyValue ( $fkObject );
57  }
58  $form->fieldAsDropDown ( $fkField, JArray::modelArray ( $this->controller->_getAdminData ()->getManyToOneDatas ( $fkClass, $instance, $member ), $fkIdGetter, "__toString" ) );
59  $form->setCaption ( $fkField, \ucfirst ( $member ) );
60  }
61  }
62  }
63 
64  protected function oneToManyFormField(DataForm $form, $member, $instance, $annot) {
65  $newField = $member . "Ids";
66  $fkClass = $annot ["className"];
67  $fkId = OrmUtils::getFirstKey ( $fkClass );
68  $fkIdGetter = "get" . \ucfirst ( $fkId );
69  $fkInstances = DAO::getOneToMany ( $instance, $member );
70  $ids = \array_map ( function ($elm) use ($fkIdGetter) {
71  return $elm->{$fkIdGetter} ();
72  }, $fkInstances );
73  $instance->{$newField} = \implode ( ",", $ids );
74  $form->fieldAsDropDown ( $newField, JArray::modelArray ( $this->controller->_getAdminData ()->getOneToManyDatas ( $fkClass, $instance, $member ), $fkIdGetter, "__toString" ), true );
75  $form->setCaption ( $newField, \ucfirst ( $member ) );
76  }
77 
78  protected function manyToManyFormField(DataForm $form, $member, $instance, $annot) {
79  $newField = $member . "Ids";
80  $fkClass = $annot ["targetEntity"];
81  $fkId = OrmUtils::getFirstKey ( $fkClass );
82  $fkIdGetter = "get" . \ucfirst ( $fkId );
83  $fkInstances = DAO::getManyToMany ( $instance, $member );
84  $ids = \array_map ( function ($elm) use ($fkIdGetter) {
85  return $elm->{$fkIdGetter} ();
86  }, $fkInstances );
87  $instance->{$newField} = \implode ( ",", $ids );
88  $form->fieldAsDropDown ( $newField, JArray::modelArray ( $this->controller->_getAdminData ()->getManyToManyDatas ( $fkClass, $instance, $member ), $fkIdGetter, "__toString" ), true, [ "jsCallback" => function ($elm) {
89  $elm->getField ()->asSearch ();
90  } ] );
91  $form->setCaption ( $newField, \ucfirst ( $member ) );
92  }
93 
98  public function getEditMemberParams() {
99  return $this->defaultEditMemberParams ();
100  }
101 
107  protected function getEditMemberParams_($part) {
108  $params = $this->getEditMemberParams ();
109  if ($params && isset ( $params [$part] )) {
110  return $params [$part];
111  }
112  return new EditMemberParams ();
113  }
114 
119  protected function defaultEditMemberParams() {
120  return [ "dataTable" => EditMemberParams::dataTable (),"dataElement" => EditMemberParams::dataElement () ];
121  }
122 
130  public function getForm($identifier, $instance) {
131  $form = $this->jquery->semantic ()->dataForm ( $identifier, $instance );
132  $form->setLibraryId ( "frmEdit" );
133  $className = \get_class ( $instance );
134  $fields = array_unique ( $this->controller->_getAdminData ()->getFormFieldNames ( $className, $instance ) );
135  $relFields = OrmUtils::getFieldsInRelations_ ( $className );
136 
137  $this->setFormFields_ ( $fields, $relFields );
138  array_unshift ( $fields, "_message" );
139  $form->setFields ( $fields );
140 
141  $fieldTypes = OrmUtils::getFieldTypes ( $className );
142  $this->setFormFieldsComponent ( $form, $fieldTypes );
143  $this->relationMembersInForm ( $form, $instance, $className, $fields, $relFields );
144  OrmUtils::setFieldToMemberNames ( $fields, $relFields );
145  $form->setCaptions ( $this->getFormCaptions ( $fields, $className, $instance ) );
146  $message = $this->getFormTitle ( $form, $instance );
147  $form->setCaption ( "_message", $message ["subMessage"] );
148  $form->fieldAsMessage ( "_message", [ "icon" => $message ["icon"] ] );
149  $instance->_message = $message ["message"];
150  $form->setSubmitParams ( $this->controller->_getBaseRoute () . "/update", "#frm-add-update" );
151  $form->onGenerateField ( [ $this,'onGenerateFormField' ] );
152  return $form;
153  }
154 
165  public function getMemberForm($identifier, $instance, $member, $td, $part) {
166  $editMemberParams = $this->getEditMemberParams_ ( $part );
167 
168  $form = $this->jquery->semantic ()->dataForm ( $identifier, $instance );
169  $form->on ( "dblclick", "", true, true );
170  $form->setProperty ( "onsubmit", "return false;" );
171  $form->addClass ( "_memberForm" );
172  $className = \get_class ( $instance );
173  $fields = [ "id",$member ];
174  $relFields = OrmUtils::getFieldsInRelations_ ( $className );
175  $hasRelations = $this->setFormFields_ ( $fields, $relFields );
176  $form->setFields ( $fields );
177  $fieldTypes = OrmUtils::getFieldTypes ( $className );
178  $form->fieldAsHidden ( 0 );
179  $this->setMemberFormFieldsComponent ( $form, $fieldTypes );
180  if ($hasRelations) {
181  $this->relationMembersInForm ( $form, $instance, $className, $fields, $relFields );
182  }
183  $form->setCaptions ( [ "","" ] );
184  $form->onGenerateField ( function (HtmlFormField $f, $nb) use ($identifier, $editMemberParams) {
185  if ($nb == 1) {
186  $f->setSize ( "mini" );
187  if ($editMemberParams->getHasButtons ()) {
188  $btO = HtmlButton::icon ( "btO", "check" )->addClass ( "green mini compact" )->onClick ( "\$('#" . $identifier . "').trigger('validate');", true, true );
189  $btC = HtmlButton::icon ( "btC", "close" )->addClass ( "mini compact" )->onClick ( "\$('#" . $identifier . "').trigger('endEdit');" );
190  $f->wrap ( "<div class='fields' style='margin:0;'>", [ $btO,$btC,"</div>" ] );
191  if (! $editMemberParams->getHasPopup ()) {
192  $f->setWidth ( 16 )->setProperty ( "style", "padding-left:0;" );
193  }
194  }
195  $f->on ( "keydown", "if(event.which == 13) {\$('#" . $identifier . "').trigger('validate');}if(event.keyCode===27) {\$('#" . $identifier . "').trigger('endEdit');}" );
196  $f->onClick ( "return false;", true, true );
197  } else {
198  $f->setProperty ( "style", "display: none;" );
199  }
200  } );
201  $form->setSubmitParams ( $this->controller->_getBaseRoute () . "/updateMember/" . $member . "/" . $editMemberParams->getUpdateCallback (), "#" . $td, [ "attr" => "","hasLoader" => false,"jsCallback" => "$(self).remove();","jqueryDone" => "html" ] );
202  if ($editMemberParams->getHasPopup ()) {
203  $endEdit = "\$('#" . $identifier . "').html();\$('.popup').hide();\$('#" . $td . "').popup('destroy');";
204  $validate = $endEdit;
205  } else {
206  $endEdit = "let td=\$('#" . $td . "');td.html(td.data('originalText'));";
207  $validate = "";
208  }
209  $form->on ( "endEdit", $endEdit );
210  $form->on ( "validate", "\$('#" . $identifier . "').form('submit');" . $validate );
211  $this->jquery->execAtLast ( "$('form').find('input[type=text],textarea,select').filter(':visible:first').focus();" );
212  return $form;
213  }
214 
215  private function setFormFields_(&$fields, $relFields) {
216  $hasRelations = false;
217  $relFields = array_flip ( $relFields );
218  foreach ( $fields as $index => $field ) {
219  if (isset ( $relFields [$field] )) {
220  $fields [$index] = $relFields [$field];
221  $hasRelations = true;
222  }
223  }
224  return $hasRelations;
225  }
226 
234  protected function getFormTitle($form, $instance) {
235  $type = ($instance->_new) ? "new" : "edit";
236  $messageInfos = [ "new" => [ "icon" => HtmlIconGroups::corner ( "table", "plus", "big" ),"subMessage" => "New object creation" ],"edit" => [ "icon" => HtmlIconGroups::corner ( "table", "edit", "big" ),"subMessage" => "Editing an existing object" ] ];
237  $message = $messageInfos [$type];
238  $message ["message"] = \get_class ( $instance );
239  return $message;
240  }
241 
248  public function setFormFieldsComponent(DataForm $form, $fieldTypes) {
249  $this->setFormFieldsComponent_ ( $form, $fieldTypes );
250  }
251 
258  public function setMemberFormFieldsComponent(DataForm $form, $fieldTypes) {
259  $this->setFormFieldsComponent_ ( $form, $fieldTypes );
260  }
261 
262  protected function setFormFieldsComponent_(DataForm $form, $fieldTypes) {
263  foreach ( $fieldTypes as $property => $type ) {
264  switch ($property) {
265  case "password" :
266  $form->fieldAsInput ( $property, [ "inputType" => "password" ] );
267  $form->setValidationParams ( [ "inline" => true ] );
268  break;
269  case "email" :
270  case "mail" :
271  $form->fieldAsInput ( $property, [ "inputType" => "email","rules" => [ [ "email" ] ] ] );
272  break;
273  }
274 
275  switch ($type) {
276  case "tinyint(1)" :
277  $form->fieldAsCheckbox ( $property );
278  break;
279  case "int" :
280  case "integer" :
281  $form->fieldAsInput ( $property, [ "inputType" => "number" ] );
282  break;
283  case "date" :
284  $form->fieldAsInput ( $property, [ "inputType" => "date" ] );
285  break;
286  case "datetime" :
287  $form->fieldAsInput ( $property, [ "inputType" => "datetime-local" ] );
288  break;
289  }
290  }
291  }
292 
298  public function onGenerateFormField($field, $nb) {
299  if ($field instanceof HtmlFormInput) {
300  if ($field->getDataField ()->getProperty ( 'type' ) == "datetime-local") {
301  $v = $field->getDataField ()->getProperty ( 'value' );
302  $field->getDataField ()->setValue ( date ( "Y-m-d\TH:i:s", strtotime ( $v ) ) );
303  }
304  }
305  return;
306  }
307 
315  public function isModal($objects, $model) {
316  return \count ( $objects ) > 5;
317  }
318 
325  public function getFormCaptions($captions, $className, $instance) {
326  return \array_map ( "ucfirst", $captions );
327  }
